description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has installed web shells on exploited Microsoft Exchange servers.(Citation: Cybersecurity Advisory SVR TTP May 2021)(Citation: Mandiant APT29 Eye Spy Email Nov 22)
